Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls take on the Utah Jazz in non-conference play.
Chicago went 39-43 overall a season ago while going 20-21 at home.
The Bulls gave up 113.7 points per game while committing 18.8 fouls last season.
Utah finished 31-51 overall last season while going 10-31 on the road.
The Jazz averaged 115.7 points per game while shooting 46.7% from the field and 35.4% from behind the arc last season.
Bulls: Lonzo Ball is out with a wrist injury.
Jazz: Lauri Markkanen is out with a back injury, Taylor Hendricks is out for the season with a fibula injury, Jordan Clarkson is out with a heel injury, Isaiah Collier is out with a hamstring injury.
